data.body:
in addition to removing stage:verification, the thumbs down should add/replace the following labels

stage:retry
attempts:{number of attempts}

for example, if bead only has

stage:verification

thumbs down would change labels to

stage:retry 
attempts:1

if bead has

stage:verification
attempts:2

thums down would change labels to

stage:retry
attempts:3

data.title: reject thumbs down should add labels
